titleStmt.title: An elegie upon the much lamented death of the Right Honourable, the Lord Brooke.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Robert Austin, and Andrew Coe,

notesStmt.note: Verse - "Weep not unthrifty mourners: why so fast".
Imperfect: copy stained and cropped with loss of print.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
